on reading compounds: 新生児【シンセイジ】newborn baby
遺児【イジ】orphan, child left by the deceased, abandoned child
kun reading compounds: 子【こ】child, young (animal), young woman, young geisha, offshoot, interest, new shares, player who is not a dealer (in cards, mahjong, etc.), bird egg, -er (often of young women)
克鯨【こくくじら】gray whale (Eschrichtius robustus)
江戸っ子【えどっこ】true Tokyoite, person born and raised in Edo
駄々っ子【だだっこ】unmanageable child, spoiled child (spoilt), spoiled brat
